title: Bug 103963: Missing error message when there is no data for series
description: If there is no data for a series, the software should display a friendly error message to remind the user.
OB: Currently, when there is no data for a series, no error message is shown to the user.
EB: When there is no data for a series, the software should display a friendly error message to remind the user.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Load a dataset that has no data for a particular series. Ensure that the series has no associated data. 2. Observe that no error message is displayed to the user.
